name: Neo Edda Demo
description:
Ragnarøkkr, the Twilight of the Gods, the end of all things.

Over a thousand years have passed since that fateful day, and humanity continues to thrive. While the Aesir recovered, new gods have taken over and now rule the modern world, and only a handful of humans still hold onto the old faiths.

Humans aren’t the only remnants from the past age however. Creatures and spirits of old have been causing havoc, unaware of the change of power. In order to keep the peace between the new and old gods, the Aesir send one of their followers to investigate these attacks.

What they don’t know is, this is just the beginning of their problems…

This is a demo for the upcoming game Neo Edda. Please stay tuned for more information on its development and future updates!
